title: Japan's failure to recognize same-sex marriage is 'unconstitutional,' court rules
content:
1. Japan's failure to recognize same-sex marriage is 'unconstitutional,' court rules  CNN
  2. In landmark ruling, Japan court says it is 'unconstitutional' to bar same-sex marriage  Yahoo News
  3. Court says Japan's ban on same-sex marriage unconstitutional  The Associated Press
  4. Japan Court Rules Same-Sex Couples Have Marriage Rights in Landmark Decision  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Japan's Failure to Recognize Same-Sex Marriage Breaks Country's Constitution, Court Rules  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
